topics.body:
"@Gizoid101":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/539fb3066368726a1a6f0000#post_539fb3066368726a1a6f0000
[bq="Gizoid101"]"@AaronMk":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/539fb1e36368726cff2b0000#post_539fb1e36368726cff2b0000

Banned? For what?[/bq]

Three days, for talking about Fallout Equestria and posting what I didn't even consider as an unsavory animation I made for it.

But I'll never know because they don't outright tell you what it was they banned you for exactly. So for as much as I know I was "banned for this.":https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jfyOyj4ZU44

Which I know made a mod really fucking pissy because he clicked on it and saw it was blocked for most people by YouTube, and didn't watch it.

topics.body:
"@SeraphimDawn":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/539fc25263687275856a0000#post_539fc25263687275856a0000


reminds me how i got kicked in mlp wiki chat way way back then, it was ok to to link videos with profanities and the likes if you put explicit as warning, however one line of the song i linked said ("intense serious ass fucking") i instantly got kicked, coming back the mod said i had to tag every last explicit like profanities, sex blah blah blah thing in the video, and with the explicit tag it wasnt enough.

it wasnt as serious, but i was never told that.
topics.author: 5154c5237f123bcd580002fc

topics.body:
"@twistedmetalero":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/539fc407636872755dcd0000#post_539fc407636872755dcd0000

I want to say things'll be easier for me if they took the time to at least add in the ban message the content that got me suspended. But they don't. Apart from hemming and hawing, their mods are more mechanical than any I've been banned from so far. I'll post shit, nothing will be said, then they'll say something about keeping it clean or I get the suspension message and I'm left wondering what it's about.

so national geographic just launched a new program in latin america called the science of the absurd.

is a show a la tosh.0 or ridiculousness, where a guy shows stupid videos on the internet, except with a twist, the guy then gives a scientific explanation about why the guy in the video failed so hard, and with math explains easily to you how can you avoid this incidents.

and I LOVE IT.
